name: DIO's Bizarre Boutique
description:
Being the most fashionable vampire of Egypt is not enough, doll up your servants, you never know who's watching!

Thanks for playing DIO's Bizarre Boutique!

Made by lunafromthemoon and rumpel.

Characters and stuff are from Jojo's Bizarre Adventure (Part 3).

Music is JoJo's Bizarre Adventure (SFC) ost - Dio's Battle Theme Super Famicom / Super Nintendo.
